Articles.Content:
I just started a new career in 1.0. I was only allowed 2 active missions so I chose 1. Launch your first vehicle, and 2. Escape the Atmosphere. That left Orbit Kerbin and Gather Scientific Data as available missions for later.

I did the first launch. After the launch I went back to Mission Control and the only mission in the available list was Orbit Kerbin. The Gather Scientific Data mission was completely gone. It wasn't in the available, active, or complete tabs in mission control. It's nowhere to be found.

What did you do during your first mission?

It may be that you invalidated the "scientific data" contract via something you did.

I have the same issue but with the mission "Orbit Kerbin!"

I didn't active the contract but with some luck I did an orbit around Kerbin.

When I was back to control mission, to active the contract, he wasn't here (not in archived or completed mission)

> 
> What did you do during your first mission?
> It may be that you invalidated the "scientific data" contract via something you did.

My craft was:

-Mk16 Parachute

-command pod Mk1

-RT-5 Flea SRB

I forgot to change the staging so the parachute went off on launch along with the flea SRB. It went up about 300m, did a few flips and then landed when it ran out of fuel. I didn't touch anything except the fast forward and slow down buttons when it was coming down. Then I recovered the vessel.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-28T15:13:50Z" title="04/28/2015 03:13  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 28, 2015</time> by bdito**

I was able to recreate the bug a second time. Here's a step-by-step guide.

-Completely stock version 1.0 on Windows 8.1

-Start a new career with the default medium difficulty settings. I chose the NASA flag. I don't know if that matters.

-Go to Mission Control and choose Launch Our First Vehicle and Escape the Atmosphere as the active missions

-Go to the VAB and make a 3 part vessel as mentioned in the previous post. Don't adjust the staging. Keep the parachute on stage 1.

-Go to the launch pad and click Z to set full power, click T to enable SAS, click SPACE to launch the vessel. Do nothing and let it land by itself.

-Recover the vessel

-Go to Mission Control and now the Gather Scientific Data mission has disappeared.

It may be because you get science for "recovering a vessel that has survived a flight".

Thanks for investigating.
